bibl.title: Report on the Eighth Season of Excavation and Conservation in the Theban Tombs of Amenemope TT29 and Sennefer TT96A in Sheikh Abd el-Qurna (January 2 - February 19, 2006).
bibl.note: Excavation undertaken since 1999 by the team of the University of Brussels. - See in part. pp. 348-349: 3.5. Study of the Coptic ostraca (Lili Aït-Kaci, Anne Boud'hors and Chantal Heurtel).
bibl.seg: Tefnin Roland et alii, Report on the Eighth Season of Excavation and Conservation in the Theban Tombs of Amenemope TT29 and Sennefer TT96A in Sheikh Abd el-Qurna (January 2 - February 19, 2006).
Excavation undertaken since 1999 by the team of the University of Brussels. - See in part. pp. 348-349: 3.5. Study of the Coptic ostraca (Lili Aït-Kaci, Anne Boud'hors and Chantal Heurtel).
